identity.mission: Create a fresh, organic, and highly functional diet meal subscription system that feels like a personal nutritionist and a high-tech logistics platform combined.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix botanical aesthetics with logistics precision.
Emotion First: Every screen should feel 'fresh' and 'reliable'.
Content is King: Food images must look edible and delicious.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the meal (calories, ingredients).
Negative Space: Use white space to convey cleanliness.

usage.headings: Outfit, weights 600-800. Use for all section titles, hero text, and major stats.
usage.body: DM Sans, weights 400-500. Use for all paragraphs, labels, and data tables.
usage.ui_elements: DM Sans, weight 500. Use for buttons, badges, and navigation.

primary.name: Fresh Sage
primary.description: Used for primary actions, active states, and brand identity.

secondary.name: Organic Cream
secondary.description: Used for backgrounds, subtle highlights, and secondary buttons.

accent.name: Energetic Terracotta
accent.description: Used for CTAs, alerts, and 'hot' status indicators.

background.name: Bone White
background.description: Main application background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF for the body.

surface.name: Pure White
surface.description: Used for cards, modals, and elevated surfaces.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant. Dark mode should be deep forest green (#1a202c) rather than pure black.
colors.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients of Sage and Cream for hero sections.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay on hero sections to add organic feel.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-4 bg-white border border-input hover:bg-accent/10 hover:text-accent transition-colors

cards.style: bg-card rounded-2xl border border-border/40 shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors
cards.interaction: clickable cards must have a scale-up effect (scale-[1.02]) on hover.

inputs.style: rounded-lg border-input bg-background px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

navigation.style: sticky top-4 z-50 mx-4 rounded-2xl border border-white/20 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl shadow-sm

zones.orders: Card-based list of active orders with large status buttons.
zones.stats: Top bar summary of Total Orders, Pending, Completed.

zones.list: w-full md:w-96 bg-background border-l z-10 overflow-y-auto

hero_food.usage: Landing page hero, Customer dashboard header

delivery_scooter.usage: Delivery tracking page, Delivery boy dashboard

motion.loading: Use skeleton loaders with a shimmering effect, not spinners.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards. Use dark charcoal (#1A202C) for text on light backgrounds, not pure black.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings with 2px offset and primary color.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'react-leaflet' for maps. DO NOT use Google Maps.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the Customer Dashboard.
Ensure the Kitchen Dashboard has LARGE buttons for touch targets.
The Delivery Dashboard must prioritize the Map view on mobile.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. DO NOT use random Lorem Ipsum images.
Follow the color palette strictly. Do not introduce new colors without reason.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no default blue/gray themes.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute.
